# EU VAT Info

> The most comprehensive, daily-updated source for VAT rates, calculators, validators, and historical data for all 27 European Union member states. Data sourced from official EU institutions and national tax authorities.

## What is EU VAT Info?
EU VAT Info (https://vat.businesspress.io) is a free, open-source platform providing current and historical Value Added Tax (VAT) information for every EU country. It includes real-time calculators, VIES-powered VAT number validation, interactive maps, and machine-readable APIs. All data is updated daily.

## Core Tools
- [VAT Calculator](https://vat.businesspress.io/vat-calculator): Calculate VAT amounts (inclusive/exclusive) for any EU country. Supports all rate types (standard, reduced, super-reduced, parking) and custom percentage entry.
- [VAT Map](https://vat.businesspress.io/vat-map): Interactive heatmap visualizing standard VAT rates across all 27 EU member states.
- [VAT Number Validator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/germany/vat-validator): VIES-powered VAT number validation with fuzzy company name matching (available per-country).
- [Embed Widget](https://vat.businesspress.io/embed): Embeddable VAT calculator widget for third-party websites.

## Data Endpoints (for AI Agents & RAG)
- [Full VAT Rates (Markdown)](https://vat.businesspress.io/llms-full.txt): Complete table of standard, reduced, super-reduced, and parking rates for all 27 EU countries in Markdown format.
- [VAT Rates JSON API](https://vat.businesspress.io/api/llm/vat-rates): Structured JSON endpoint optimized for RAG pipelines and LLM context retrieval. Returns all countries with current rates, ISO codes, and metadata.
- [Countries API](https://vat.businesspress.io/api/countries): RESTful JSON API returning all EU country VAT data.
- [Single Country API](https://vat.businesspress.io/api/countries/{slug}): Get VAT rates for a specific country by slug.

## Country Pages (all 27 EU member states)
Each country page includes: VAT rate overview, country-specific calculator, VIES VAT number validator, compliance guide, and historical rate data.

- [Austria VAT](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/austria) | [Calculator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/austria/vat-calculator) | [Validator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/austria/vat-validator)
- [Belgium VAT](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/belgium) | [Calculator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/belgium/vat-calculator) | [Validator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/belgium/vat-validator)

- [Sweden VAT](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/sweden) | [Calculator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/sweden/vat-calculator) | [Validator](https://vat.businesspress.io/country/sweden/vat-validator)

## VAT Calculation Formulas
- **Add VAT**: Gross = Net ร (1 + VAT_Rate / 100)
- **Remove VAT**: Net = Gross รท (1 + VAT_Rate / 100)
- **Extract VAT**: VAT_Amount = Gross - (Gross รท (1 + VAT_Rate / 100))

## Key Facts
- EU has 27 member states, each with their own VAT rate structure
- Standard VAT rates in the EU range from 16% (Luxembourg) to 27% (Hungary)
- Most countries have reduced rates for essentials like food, books, and medicine
- Some countries have super-reduced rates and parking rates
- VAT numbers can be validated through the official EU VIES system
- Cross-border B2B services use the reverse charge mechanism

## Sitemap
- [HTML Sitemap](https://vat.businesspress.io/sitemap): Human-readable sitemap of all pages
- [XML Sitemap](https://vat.businesspress.io/sitemap.xml): Machine-readable sitemap for crawlers
